blueprint.description: Installs the HashiCorp Vault client on almost any platform
blueprint.overview: [HashiCorp Vault](https://www.vaultproject.io/) secures, stores, and tightly controls access to tokens, passwords, certificates, API keys, and other secrets. Basically, it is a tool for managing any data that you want to tightly control access to. It also has some advanced integrations with systems like AWS.
blueprint.name: HashiCorp Vault
blueprint.title: HashiCorp Vault
